segments.text: Mon and I got in another fight , Boris .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , Iris ! what was it about this time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it was over food . I simply wanted some fried chicken but she said no .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I believe she was right . You must know that fried foods contain a lot of fat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , she keeps saying that . She never allows me to have them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you'd better take her advice since health is the greatest wealth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But , Boris , i am not a baby any more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: she also believes in healthy diet . And she requires us to have regular meals .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: poor you . It seems we are in the same boat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , i am grateful for my mother on this point . her idea of healthy eating helps me a lot keeping fit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: really ? so you don't have fried food at all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: not really . I may have some occasionally for a chance . But I don't indulge myself too much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's pretty simple , Iris . Just keep it in mind that you're what you eat .
segments.speaker: S2
